name: Nana - Telegram Userbot with Assistant
description: A modular Telegram Userbot with Assistant running on Python 3.6+

ENV.description: Fill this if you using environ variable as config.

api_id.description: To use this userbot, get your development App ID from https://my.telegram.org/apps.

api_hash.description: To use this userbot, get your development API hash from https://my.telegram.org/apps.

Owner.description: Go to some bot such as Rose and check your id there.

DB_URI.description: Required to use an external db, try ElephantSQL: https://customer.elephantsql.com/login

REMINDER_UPDATE.description: (optional) Pass False to disable reminder update every running script

NANA_IMG.description: (optional) Image URL to show up in your Assistant

thumbnail_API.description: (optional) To get an API key, signup at https://thumbnail.ws/.

screenshotlayer_API.description: (optional) To get an API key, signup at https://screenshotlayer.com/.

PM_PERMIT.description: (optional) Set to True if you want to turn on PM Permit

lydia_api.description: (optional) Fill in your Coffeehouse API, get one from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net

bitly_token.description: (optional) Sign in to https://http://app.bitly.com/, then open Profile Settings -> Generic Access Token.

remove_bg_api.description: (optional) To get an API toen, signup at https://www.remove.bg/.

HEROKU_API.description: Your Heroku API key for updater to work. Generate one at https://dashboard.heroku.com/account/applications/authorizations/new.

USERBOT_LOAD.description: (optional) Fill if you want to load some modules for your userbot.

USERBOT_NOLOAD.description: (optional) Fill if you want to unload some modules for your userbot.

ASSISTANT_LOAD.description: (optional) Fill if you want to load some modules for your Assistant.

ASSISTANT_NOLOAD.description: (optional) Fill if you want to unload some modules for your Assistant.

sw_api.description: Read SpamWatch Docs on How to obtain api, https://docs.spamwat.ch/
